Impossible.Creatures.PC.Game(djDEVASTATE?)


Impossible Creatures is a 3D real-time strategy game set in the 1930's that pits the player against an evil madman in a desperate campaign across a chain of remote and diverse islands. Using Earth's most formidable animals as building blocks, the player creates an army of unique, mutant monsters in a struggle to protect an unsuspecting world.


Extract Archive To Any Desired Directory With Winrar Or 7zip etc.........


NO INSTALL JUST EXTRACT AND PLAY 

Start Game With IC.exe


ENJOY AND PLEASE SEED
plz help i extracted the file with 7 zip but when i run ic.exe it says please wait for a bit then crashes.
im having the same prob as swaadx and i used winrar

worked perfectly for me. downloaded using Vuze, extracted the whole folder to my desktop using winrar, went in to the folder, created a shortcut for IC.exe on my desktop (i didnt remove it from my folder, the original IC.exe) double clicked the shortcut and the game launched. i dont know what anyone else did, but thats what worked for me.
